reasoning_steps: Step 1: Screened for upstream (E&P) corporate acquisitions and upstream asset sales announced between 07/01/2025 and 12/31/2025 with disclosed deal value >= $100m using company press releases/SEC filings and major newswires (e.g., Reuters, GlobeNewswire, Business Wire).

Step 2: Verified deal value (USD) and consideration structure from primary announcements (press releases/SEC filings). Mapped consideration to Cash/Stock/Hybrid based on whether consideration was all-cash, all-stock, or a mix of cash and equity/units.

Step 3: Validated timing by using the announcement date in the cited source and validated industry fit by confirming the target/asset description is upstream oil & gas producing properties/acreage (E&P). Excluded any deals outside H2 2025 or < $100m.
